{"id":624159906,"lang":"java","time":"1 month, 1 week","timestamp":1642708930,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/624159906/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Valid Number","memory":"39.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isNumber(String s) {\n        boolean seenDigit = false, seenExponent = false, seenDot = false;\n        \n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            char curr = s.charAt(i);\n            \n            if (Character.isDigit(curr)) {\n                seenDigit = true;\n            } else if (curr == '+' || curr == '-') {\n                if (i > 0 && s.charAt(i - 1) != 'e' && s.charAt(i - 1) != 'E') {\n                    return false;\n                }\n            } else if (curr == 'e' || curr == 'E') {\n                if (seenExponent || !seenDigit) return false;\n                seenExponent = true;\n                seenDigit = false;\n            } else if (curr == '.') {\n                if (seenDot || seenExponent) return false;\n                seenDot = true;\n            } else {\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        return seenDigit;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"valid-number"}
